opinion:
BANK OF NEW HAVEN v. ESPOSITO, 47 Conn. App. 923 (1997) 703 A.2d 1196 BANK OF NEW HAVEN v. JUDITH A. ESPOSITO ET AL. (AC 17304)Appellate Court of Connecticut
Landau, Schaller and Daly, Js.
Submitted on briefs December 5, 1997
Officially released December 23, 1997
Appeal by named defendant et al. from the Superior Court in the judicial district of New Haven, Hon. Donald W. Celotto, judge trial referee.
Per Curiam.
The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting a new sale date.
